1.2.5. Creating AFM Network Firewall Rules¶

  • 1.2.5.1. Default Actions

  • 1.2.5.7. Test the New Firewall Rules
  • 1.2.5.8. Creating an Additional Rule List for Additional Services

  • 1.2.5.10. Test Access to the Server
